PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-05892016-06-21,  ,  ,  ,  ESDC
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) simplify claimants’ responsibilities to seek and accept suitable employment, by reversing to some of the criteria that existed prior to the 2012 amendments; (2) continue to enable Service Canada staff to monitor claimants’ eligibility and ensure claimants are fulfilling their responsibilities; and (3) support claimants to return to work.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0162 Publication Date: 2016-07-13
AttachmentsAttachment
